name: Little adventure
description:
Little adventure is a 2D platformer adventure game with beautiful graphics. You have to play as Ben, who found himself in the forest due to strange circumstances. Immerse yourself in a fantasy world full of danger and adventure!

Start your journey in a wonderful forest, meet its inhabitants, but beware of enemy creatures! Equip yourself with a sword or bow and clear the forest of monsters!

Features:
• Beautiful graphics
• Wonderful soundtrack
• Interesting characters
• Pleasant atmosphere
